name: CRM Data Quality Standards
description: Data quality checks for CRM records

seo.title: CRM Data Quality Standards v1.0.0 | lksy.org
seo.description: 20 data quality checks for CRM records to ensure data accuracy and completeness.

checks.name: Email Format Valid
checks.description: Verify email address is in valid format
checks.rationale: Invalid emails cannot be used for outreach

checks.name: Email Domain Valid
checks.description: Verify email domain exists and has MX records
checks.rationale: Invalid domains indicate bad data

checks.name: Phone Format Valid
checks.description: Verify phone number is in valid format
checks.rationale: Invalid phone numbers cannot be used

checks.name: Name Complete
checks.description: Verify first name and last name are present
checks.rationale: Incomplete names reduce personalization

checks.name: Company Name Present
checks.description: Verify company name is present for account records
checks.rationale: Company name is essential for B2B records

checks.name: Address Complete
checks.description: Verify address fields are complete if address is provided
checks.rationale: Incomplete addresses are less useful

checks.name: No Duplicate Records
checks.description: Verify no duplicate records exist (same email or phone)
checks.rationale: Duplicates cause data quality issues

checks.name: Job Title Present
checks.description: Verify job title is present for contact records
checks.rationale: Job title helps with lead qualification

checks.name: Industry Classified
checks.description: Verify industry is classified for account records
checks.rationale: Industry helps with segmentation

checks.name: Company Size
checks.description: Verify company size is set for account records
checks.rationale: Company size helps with lead qualification

checks.name: Lead Source
checks.description: Verify lead source is tracked
checks.rationale: Lead source is essential for attribution

checks.name: No Test Data
checks.description: Verify no test data (test@, example.com, etc.)
checks.rationale: Test data pollutes production data

checks.name: No Placeholder Text
checks.description: Verify no placeholder text (N/A, TBD, etc.)
checks.rationale: Placeholder text indicates incomplete data

checks.name: Website URL Valid
checks.description: Verify website URL is valid and accessible
checks.rationale: Invalid URLs indicate bad data

checks.name: LinkedIn URL Valid
checks.description: Verify LinkedIn URL is valid format if provided
checks.rationale: Invalid LinkedIn URLs indicate bad data

checks.name: Last Activity Date
checks.description: Verify last activity date is tracked
checks.rationale: Activity dates help with lead scoring

checks.name: Owner Assigned
checks.description: Verify record owner is assigned
checks.rationale: Unassigned records cannot be worked

checks.name: Stage Progression Valid
checks.description: Verify stage progression follows logical order
checks.rationale: Invalid stage progression indicates data issues

checks.name: Amount Valid
checks.description: Verify deal amount is positive number if stage is closed-won
checks.rationale: Closed-won deals should have amounts

checks.name: Close Date Valid
checks.description: Verify close date is in future for open deals, past for closed deals
checks.rationale: Close dates should match deal stage
